review: Did not find it to be useful. Many old movies and non hd freebies.  Will not be using it.
author: Dan Baldauf

review: So far the Fire TV Stick is amazing! I have not tried Netflix yet but have watched several shows on Prime.  Best device around and worth the wait!  I will be taking this with us on all family vacations in the future.  Set up was incredibly easy and took mere minutes.  If you are considering purchasing the Fire Stick do it now, don't wait!
author: Shoebunnie

review: DID WHAT IT IS SUPPOSED TO DO.
author: Gurpreet Bhatia "twilight book worm.."

review: We love the fire TV stick. Especially having the remote control.
author: Carol Skinner

review: Good device and easy to use. All you need is in the box, no additional purchasing of all the items.
author: Roger F.

review: Makes viewing streaming videos a snap. .
author: Gordon Ramsay

review: Very happy with the Fire stick! Great picture and sound quality. No downloading delays. So far has streamed perfectly.
author: Don McGlynn
